overview:
As Consumer & Online GM of Belgium, Ervan is in charge of Microsoft consumer products like WindowsPC , Windows Phones and Internet services like MSN, WL and Bing.

Beforehand, he led that division in Central & Eastern Europe.

Previously, Ervan was the Marketing Director of Microsoft Online in CEE and MEA. He initially joined Microsoft at Corp as the global marketing manager in Microsoftâ€™s Mobile and Embedded Devices Division and was responsible for the mobile operator audience. He then joined the Online division as the product manager leading the Windows Live hardware ecosystem, engaging with Microsoft Hardware and third-party vendors.

Before joining Microsoft, he was a consultant with McKinsey & Co. Pouliquen received a masterâ€™s degree in business administration (M.B.A.) from Harvard Business School.
